flavor: Sometimes in an instant you realize who your friends really are.
printed_text:
Play only as your first [click].
Look at the top 6 cards of your stack. You may trash any of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.
stripped_printed_text: Play only as your first click. Look at the top 6 cards of your stack. You may trash any of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.

flavor: "Underestimate those people at your own peril." -Akshara Sareen
printed_text: Access → Pay the trash cost of the card you are accessing: Remove it from the game. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: Access -> Pay the trash cost of the card you are accessing: Remove it from the game. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor: The more parties she attended, the more they trusted her. The more they trusted her, the more entertaining her scams became.
printed_text:
Draw 1 card. Gain 1[credit] for each copy of Exclusive Party in your heap.
Limit 6 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: Draw 1 card. Gain 1 credit for each copy of Exclusive Party in your heap. Limit 6 per deck.

printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with exactly 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with exactly 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. 2 credits: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.

printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines. 2[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, add 1 installed non-virus program to the top of your stack.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 subroutines. 2 credits: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, add 1 installed non-virus program to the top of your stack.

flavor: "Anyone who can afford dwarf elephants can afford to be my friend." -Fake-ir
printed_text:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, draw 2 cards.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, draw 2 cards.

flavor: In these days of digital full-sim browsing and widely available nano-assembly, it takes a special kind of crazy person to go shopping in meatspace. There are millions of them.
printed_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware from your grip, you may install another copy of that hardware from your grip (paying all costs).
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware from your grip, you may install another copy of that hardware from your grip (paying all costs).

printed_text: Whenever the Runner searches the stack or installs a card from the heap, they trash 1 card from the grip at random.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner searches the stack or installs a card from the heap, they trash 1 card from the grip at random.

printed_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [haas-bioroid] cards in your deck. The first time you spend 3[click] on the same action each turn, gain [click].
stripped_printed_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance haas-bioroid cards in your deck. The first time you spend 3click on the same action each turn, gain click.

printed_text: This asset costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [jinteki] cards in your deck. Whenever you draw a card, you may lose [click]. If you do, reveal that card and 1 card in Archives of the same type. Swap those cards. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: This asset costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance jinteki cards in your deck. Whenever you draw a card, you may lose click. If you do, reveal that card and 1 card in Archives of the same type. Swap those cards. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor: "Connect two truths. Connect two programs. All is one."
printed_text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2[credit]. [subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.

flavor: "As the world shrinks, communications becomes the most essential technology." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy
printed_text: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit.

printed_text: This operation costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. Choose a card name. The Runner reveals the grip and trashes all cards with the chosen name revealed this way.
stripped_printed_text: This operation costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance nbn cards in your deck. Choose a card name. The Runner reveals the grip and trashes all cards with the chosen name revealed this way.

printed_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [weyland-consortium] cards in your deck. [click]: Search R&D for an executive, sysop, or character, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_printed_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance weyland-consortium cards in your deck. click: Search R&D for an executive, sysop, or character, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

flavor: "Wealth wisely invested is wealth earned." -The New Gospel of Wealth
printed_text: Whenever you rez or play an out-of-faction card (including Indian Union Stock Exchange), gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you rez or play an out-of-faction card (including Indian Union Stock Exchange), gain 1 credit.

flavor: The naja naja is the king of all serpents.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.

flavor: It's the exact same coffee, but the price sure is different.
printed_text: Search R&D for any number of copies of a card, reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Search R&D for any number of copies of a card, reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

printed_text:
This upgrade costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, they must trash it, if able.
stripped_printed_text: This upgrade costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck. When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, they must trash it, if able.
